text: Hi, we have created a child theme and it come with a child.css. now my question is do I have to link the child theme to the template as well?
Everything (templates and modules) are inherited from the parent, so you don't have to do anything else to start using the child theme

Your website pages would need to be built using the child theme, if you originally built them with the parent/marketplace theme, then you would have to modify the page templates to refer to the child instead of the parent

Awesome! Thank you.
